Package simulationModelling

Provides the classes necessary to create a simulation model.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    This class is the super class to the two classes: ConditionalAction and ScheduledAction.
    Activity
    Super class to all variations of activity classes: ConditionalActivity, SequelActivity, ScheduledActivity, ExtConditinalActivity, ExtSequelActivity, ExtScheduledActivity,.
    AOSimulationModel
    This class is extended to create a simulation model using the Activity Object World View.
    Behaviour
    Super class of all behaviour construct classes, including action constructs.
    ConditionalAction
    Extend this class to implement conditional action constructs.
    ConditionalActivity
    Extend this class to implement conditional activity constructs.
    ExtConditionalActivity
    Extend this class to implement extended conditional activity constructs.
    ExtScheduledActivity
    Extend this class to implement extended scheduled activity constructs.
    ExtScheduledSequelActivity
    Extend this class to implement extended scheduled sequel activity constructs.
    ExtSequelActivity
    Extend this class to implement extended sequel activity constructs.
    OutputSequence
    Use this class to create objects that represent trajectory or sample sequences.
    SBNotice
    This class is used to create scheduled behaviour notices stored on the sbl (scheduled behaviour list).
    ScheduledAction
    Extend this class to implement scheduled action constructs.
    ScheduledActivity
    Extend this class to implement scheduled activity constructs.
    ScheduledSequelAction
    Extend this class to implement scheduled sequel action constructs.
    ScheduledSequelActivity
    Extend this class to implement scheduled sequel activity constructs.
    SequelActivity
    Extend this class to implement sequel activity constructs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScheduledActivity.EventScheduled
    This enumerated type is used for defining the instance variable eventSched.

Package simulationModelling Description

Provides the classes necessary to create a simulation model.

Provides the abstract classes to create all behaviour objects with the following hierarchy. The class AOSimulationModel is used to create a simulation model class with inherited methods used to run the simulation model.
